name: FileFort Backup File
summary: Learn about .BKZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: FileFort can be used to manually create backups or to schedule backups that automatically create BKZ files.

description: Backup file created by FileFort, a program used for backing up data to discs, external drives, and remote storage locations via FTP or a Google Drive; can be double-clicked to restore the backed up files to their original location.
